page.title: 14OLD HARLOW SHOPPING PRECINCT
page.content: Before the New Town,{Old Harlow}was the main shopping centre.Attitudes of shopkeepers have changed since the High Street was closed to traffic and made a{pedestrian precinct.}This was one of the better changes, but even with the modernisation of shops (self -service and health regulations) the 'olde worlde charm' still exists in certain parts of the village including shops.Many of the shopkeepers believe that the building of the{Harvey Centre in the new town has made a vast difference to the spending power in the village as a whole.Some even believe that trade is slowly dying and in order to bring more custom to the village ,there will have to be some major changes in the future ,but what is uncertain.One question people are asking is "Will the development of {Stansted Airport}affect it ?"
